body:
Comment 1: 
// compile with -l
package main

type T struct {
        a int64
        b int16
}

func (t T) F() []int {
        return []int{1}
}

func main() {
        m := make(map[T]bool)
        t := T{}
        m[t] = true
        println(m[t])
        t.F()
        println(m[t])
}
